90051320-LapentaDungeon-null.name:
Effect activated by one of the following conditions:

Equip weapon & 4+ pieces of <font color='#FFD200'>Behemoth</font> set, which can be obtained from the <font color='#00A2ED'>Frostpillar Temple</font> chaos raid.
Equip weapon & 5+ pieces of <font color='#FFD200'>Soulrend</font> set, which can be obtained from the <font color='#00A2ED'>Blackshard Nexus</font> Eye of Lapenta dungeon.
